description.originalText:
My wife and I are delighted to recommend Ally (they/them) as a babysitter for anyone looking for a caring, reliable, and dedicated individual to care for their children. Ally has been looking after our son and daughter for almost 10 years. They loved Ally when they were babies and now that our son is 12 and our daughter is 10, Ally is still their favorite babysitter!

Ally has an incredible ability to connect with both of them and takes the time to understand their individual personalities and needs, ensuring that each one feels valued and engaged. Whether it's playing imaginative games, reading stories, or helping with schoolwork, Ally always brings fun into every moment.

One of the qualities that sets Ally apart is her reliability and professionalism. Ally is always punctual, communicates well with us, does light chores (meal prep, dishes, etc.), and is flexible when our schedules change. We never have to worry when Ally is looking after the kids because they keep us updated and makes sure that our kidâ€™s routines are followed.

We wholeheartedly recommend Ally as a babysitter. Ally has been an amazing addition to our family, and I am confident they will be a wonderful caregiver for yours as well!!!
